archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Forecast high level resource demand & capture new opportunities
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Forecast resource demand and capture new opportunities for future needs of new/existing customers

properties.value: Forecast Resource demand & capture new opportunities processes ensures that budgets are assigned which allow the enterprise to implement the resource capabilities and capacity necessary for the future needs of their customers and potential customers. This may use AI techniques to simulate different scenarios for more accurate predictions.
